article_node.title: Lauren Sanchez Bezos Is Left 'Heartbroken' After Son Evan Moves Out of Family Home To Start 'His Next Chapter' at College
article_node.summary: Lauren Sanchez Bezos celebrated her wedding to Jeff Bezos and her son Evan’s departure to college, sharing a photo of him setting up his dorm. The couple, who recently moved their primary residence from Seattle to Florida’s Indian Creek Island, are building a new compound while Bezos’s tax savings from the move are estimated at $610 million. Bezos owns several homes on the island, with one set to become their main residence as the others are slated for demolition. The family’s Florida lifestyle is highlighted by proximity to other high-profile neighbors such as Tom Brady and Ivanka Trump.
